title: How to peel sweet corn easily | How to remove corn kernels in 1 minute | Peeling Trick |Simple Trick

tasks.task: Remove corn kernels using a spoon.
subtasks: Extract the first row of kernels carefully, noting initial resistance.
Push extracted kernels out and observe ease of removal after the first row.
Extract adjacent rows, demonstrating ease after the initial rows.
Store extracted kernels in freezer for up to 50 days.
Serve corn kernels raw as a sweet snack.

tasks.task: Prepare sweet corn kernels for consumption.
subtasks: Use a spoon to dekernels corn.
Emphasize the process starts with mashed-up first row.
Show ease of extraction after initial row.
Store dekernels sweet corn in freezer.
Recommend consuming raw for maximum sweetness.
